item.title: Automation using Ansible: Part-I
item.description: This article contains brief introduction about Ansible. At the end I will share playbook for Nginx installation. Introduction to Ansible Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy. Avoid writing scripts or custom code to deploy and update your applications â€” automate in a language that approaches plain English. Advantages of using Ansible Open Source Agentless Effeicient Simple YAML Reproducibility Does all kinds of stuff (Provisioning, Configuration Management, Orchestration etc.
